segmentosSRT.text: This is our town leader, Mr. Niu.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Our family's turn to donate iron.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text:
The workers deserve entertaining,
don't they?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: You know, I sang for the Liberation Army...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Give it to us if you can't finish.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: What the hell are you doing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, daddy wants you to see the show.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Good, it'll be hot and sour soup.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Your boy's on his way with a bowl of tea.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: The District Head's making an inspection.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: All right. You go on ahead.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Tell him to leave. He killed my son.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Have something to eat first. Lunch is ready.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: I'll get some water so you can wash up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia's going to be a mother.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia, you're going to be a mother.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: have a photo taken every year.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: you still owe us a life!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Mr. Niu, is your wife at home?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text:
Fengxia's about to have a baby.
It's to thank the matchmaker!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: So we've got to get going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: We'll bring the baby to see you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text:
We'll visit you after
she's out of the hospital.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: When you're pushing, bite on a towel.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Do whatever the doctor tells you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: It'll be quick if you push.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text:
What is he doing here?
No reactionaries allowed!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text:
This is the same Wang Bin
who once insulted...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: The working class is really something!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: We said it would be fine!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Let us have a quick peek, please?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03
